verses.verse: Then he brought me <S%H7725>back<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> which <S%H6437>looks<s%> toward the <S%H6921>east;<s%> and it was <S%H5462>shut.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8179>me,<s%> This gate shall be <S%H5462>shut;<s%> it shall not be <S%H6605>opened,<s%> neither shall any <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H935>enter<s%> in by <S%H3068>it;<s%> for Yahweh, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> has <S%H935>entered<s%> in by <S%H5462>it;<s%> therefore it shall be shut.

As for the <S%H5387>prince,<s%> he shall <S%H3427>sit<s%> therein as <S%H5387>prince<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> he shall <S%H935>enter<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> by the way of the <S%H1870>same.<s%>

Then he <S%H935>brought<s%> me by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1004>house;<s%> and I <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H3519>behold,<s%> the glory of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> and I <S%H5307>fell<s%> on my <S%H6440>face.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1121>me,<s%> Son of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H7760>mark<s%> <S%H3820>well,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> with your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> with your <S%H241>ears<s%> all that I <S%H1696>tell<s%> you concerning all the <S%H2708>ordinances<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and all its <S%H8451>laws;<s%> and <S%H7760>mark<s%> <S%H3820>well<s%> the <S%H3996>entrance<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> with every <S%H4161>exit<s%> of the <S%H4720>sanctuary.<s%>

You shall <S%H559>tell<s%> the <S%H4805>rebellious,<s%> even to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> you <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> let it <S%H7227>suffice<s%> you of all your <S%H8441>abominations,<s%>

in that you have <S%H935>brought<s%> in <S%H1121>foreigners,<s%> <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%> and <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> in <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> to be in my <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> to <S%H2490>profane<s%> <S%H1004>it,<s%> even my house, when you <S%H7126>offer<s%> my <S%H3899>bread,<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> and the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and they have <S%H6565>broken<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> to <S%H413>add<s%> to all your <S%H8441>abominations.<s%>

You have not <S%H4931>performed<s%> the <S%H4931>duty<s%> of my holy <S%H6944>things;<s%> but you have <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H8104>performers<s%> of my <S%H4931>duty<s%> in my sanctuary for <S%H4720>yourselves.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh,<s%> No <S%H1121>foreigner,<s%> <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%> and <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> in <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into my <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> of any foreigners who are <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

But the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> who went <S%H7368>far<s%> from <S%H3478>me,<s%> when Israel went <S%H8582>astray,<s%> who went <S%H8582>astray<s%> from me <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H1544>idols,<s%> they shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

Yet they shall be <S%H8334>ministers<s%> in my <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> having <S%H6486>oversight<s%> at the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H8334>ministering<s%> in the <S%H1004>house:<s%> they shall <S%H7819>kill<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> for the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and they shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them to minister to <S%H8334>them.<s%>

Because they <S%H8334>ministered<s%> to them <S%H6440>before<s%> their <S%H1544>idols,<s%> and became a stumbling <S%H4383>block<s%> of <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> therefore have I lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> against <S%H5002>them,<s%> says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh,<s%> and they shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

They shall not come <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H3547>me,<s%> to execute the office of priest to <S%H5066>me,<s%> nor to come near to any of my holy <S%H6944>things,<s%> to the things that are most <S%H6944>holy;<s%> but they shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H3639>shame,<s%> and their <S%H8441>abominations<s%> which they have <S%H6213>committed.<s%>
Yet will I <S%H5414>make<s%> them <S%H8104>performers<s%> of the <S%H4931>duty<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> for all its <S%H5656>service,<s%> and for all that shall be done <S%H6213>therein.<s%>

But the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6659>Zadok,<s%> who <S%H4931>performed<s%> the <S%H4931>duty<s%> of my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> when the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H8582>astray<s%> from <S%H7126>me,<s%> they shall come near to me to <S%H8334>minister<s%> to <S%H5975>me;<s%> and they shall stand <S%H6440>before<s%> me to <S%H7126>offer<s%> to me the <S%H2459>fat<s%> and the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%>

they shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into my <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> and they shall come <S%H7126>near<s%> to my <S%H7979>table,<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> to <S%H8104>me,<s%> and they shall keep my <S%H4931>instruction.<s%>

It shall be <S%H935>that,<s%> when they enter in at the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court,<s%> they shall be <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H6593>linen<s%> <S%H899>garments;<s%> and no <S%H6785>wool<s%> shall <S%H5927>come<s%> on <S%H8334>them,<s%> while they minister in the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court,<s%> and <S%H1004>within.<s%>

They shall have <S%H6593>linen<s%> <S%H6287>tires<s%> on their <S%H7218>heads,<s%> and shall have <S%H6593>linen<s%> <S%H4370>breeches<s%> on their <S%H4975>waists;<s%> they shall not <S%H2296>clothe<s%> themselves with anything that causes <S%H3154>sweat.<s%>

When they go <S%H3318>forth<s%> into the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court,<s%> even into the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> they shall put <S%H6584>off<s%> their <S%H899>garments<s%> in which they <S%H8334>minister,<s%> and <S%H3240>lay<s%> them in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3957>rooms;<s%> and they shall <S%H3847>put<s%> on <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H899>garments,<s%> that they not <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> with their <S%H899>garments.<s%>

Neither shall they <S%H1548>shave<s%> their <S%H7218>heads,<s%> nor allow their <S%H6545>locks<s%> to grow <S%H7971>long;<s%> they shall <S%H3697>only<s%> cut off the <S%H6545>hair<s%> of their <S%H7218>heads.<s%>
Neither shall any of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine,<s%> when they <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court.<s%>

Neither shall they <S%H3947>take<s%> for their <S%H802>wives<s%> a <S%H490>widow,<s%> nor her who is put <S%H1644>away;<s%> but they shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H1330>virgins<s%> of the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> or a <S%H490>widow<s%> who is the widow of a <S%H3548>priest.<s%>

They shall <S%H3384>teach<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> the difference between the <S%H6944>holy<s%> and the <S%H2455>common,<s%> and cause them to <S%H3045>discern<s%> between the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> and the <S%H2889>clean.<s%>

In a <S%H7379>controversy<s%> they shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> to <S%H8199>judge;<s%> according to my <S%H8199>ordinances<s%> shall they <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H8104>it:<s%> and they shall keep my <S%H8451>laws<s%> and my <S%H2708>statutes<s%> in all my appointed <S%H4150>feasts;<s%> and they shall make my <S%H7676>Sabbaths<s%> <S%H6942>holy.<s%>

They shall <S%H935>go<s%> in to no <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H120>person<s%> to <S%H2930>defile<s%> <S%H1>themselves;<s%> but for father, or for <S%H517>mother,<s%> or for <S%H1121>son,<s%> or for <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> for <S%H251>brother,<s%> or for <S%H269>sister<s%> who has had no <S%H376>husband,<s%> they may defile <S%H2930>themselves.<s%>
<S%H310>After<s%> he is <S%H2893>cleansed,<s%> they shall <S%H5608>reckon<s%> to him <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

In the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H935>goes<s%> into the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> into the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court,<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> in the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> his sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>

They shall have an <S%H5159>inheritance:<s%> I am their <S%H5159>inheritance;<s%> and you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> them no <S%H272>possession<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> I am their <S%H272>possession.<s%>

They shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the meal <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and the sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and the trespass <S%H817>offering;<s%> and every devoted <S%H2764>thing<s%> in Israel shall be <S%H3478>theirs.<s%>

The <S%H7225>first<s%> of all the <S%H1061>first<s%> fruits of every <S%H8641>thing,<s%> and every offering of <S%H8641>everything,<s%> of all your offerings, shall be for the <S%H3548>priest:<s%> you shall also <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H7225>first<s%> of your <S%H6182>dough,<s%> to cause a <S%H1293>blessing<s%> to <S%H5117>rest<s%> on your <S%H1004>house.<s%>
The <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of anything that dies of <S%H5038>itself,<s%> or is <S%H2966>torn,<s%> whether it be <S%H5775>bird<s%> or <S%H929>animal.<s%>
